title: My Valentine
lyrics:
Heugbaeg simjang-e bichkkal-i peojideon sungan
Neowa nan carry on, carry on
Jebal meomchwoya hal iyuleul chajneundamyeon
Neoui momjis-e nae sum-i meojneun geos
Something in the air

(I know I know I know I know that)

Nega ppulyeo noh-eun sum



Nalkaloun nal budeuleobge hae

Bogjabhaessdeon nal neon dansunhage hae

If you wanna love, maybe It's me

Hanbeon deo malhaejwo

Naega jeonbulago ileohge yeong-wonsog-e

Meomun jeog-i eobsdago



Modeun ge beil deushae neol saegigo namyeon

My Valentine My Valentine

Onmom-i deil deushae nega manjimyeon

My Valentine My Valentine

Gikkeoshaeya 1cho seolol wonhan sogdo

Iljeonghan gyuchig-eul beos-eonassji

Igsughan saileul tteollige mandeun neon

My Valentine My Valentine



Siseon-eul pihaji anhgo naleul boneun neo

Geu nunbich hurry up, hurry up

Naleul jaechoghaneun signila mid-eulge

Jogeum deoungeol, naleul yeol-eojwo



Something in the air

(I know I know I know I know that)

Naega geulyeo noh-eun milae

Ili wa



Baby eueum swil teum-i eobs-eo neoleul budungkyeoango

Triplet lideumgwa neul-eojim-eul binteum-eobs-i woo banbog

Deo dalkomhage jeoeojwo nan ijeya somael geod-eo

I bam-en kkeut-i eobs-eo oh My Valentine



Modeun ge beil deushae neol saegigo namyeon

My Valentine My Valentine

Onmom-i deil deushae nega manjimyeon

My Valentine My Valentine

Gikkeoshaeya 1cho seolol wonhan sogdo

Iljeonghan gyuchig-eul beos-eonassji

Igsughan saileul tteollige mandeun neon

My Valentine My Valentine



Honjaneun bul-wanjeonhae gongheoham-eun ilsang-i dwae

Dul-imyeon haebol manhae jigeum naega jeungmyeonghalge

Eodum sog-e seokk-imyeonseo teojyeo naon bulbich

Get together get get get together



Deudgi joh-a ne mogsolin breeze

Nun gam-ado nun-eul tteodo



Nae sesang eodideun neoman iss-eumyeon dwae

My Valentine My Valentine

Neol jjoch-a dallida salajyeodo dwae nan

My Valentine My Valentine

Ulin beolsseo 100cho

Gajungdoeneun sogdo eotteon nonlido pil-yo eobsji

Neowa nae geolileul teum eobs-i mandeun neon

My Valentine My Valentine
